name: blooming flower basket coaster set
sizes_available: coasters: 5 1/2” x 6” basket: 3 1/2” wide x 1 1/2” tall blooming basket: 4 1/2” wide x 3” tall
notes:
the blooming flower basket coaster pattern set is a free crochet pattern that includes an easy flower coaster plus a simple crochet basket pattern.

this unique pattern features beautiful flower petal coasters that nestle perfectly into a matching crochet basket, transforming into a charming blooming flower.

the coasters are simple 6-petal center out flowers that are worked in the round. a complete video tutorial walks you through each step of the coaster.

an easy basket is made with double crochet stitches worked in the round to create a bowl shape. the coasters are then stacked into the basket with the petals up creating a bud like flower shape.

approximate finished size:

coasters: 5 1/2” x 6”
basket: 3 1/2” wide x 1 1/2” tall
blooming basket: 4 1/2” wide x 3” tall
